page.title: 17Mendip Newspaper Stories.
page.content:
{Somerset and Avon Guardian,June 1985
A{Radstock}woman was 101 on 12th June 1985.A miner's widow,she has lived in {Radstock}for 76 years.She has 1 son,5 daughters,9 grand_children and 17 great_grandchildren. { South Wansdyke}sports centre will have to be closed down for roof repairs.The swimming pool is expected to close for about 2 weeks. An eight year old girl was given a Gayle mobile.This was a bright red powered tricycle made for her by students at{Radstock}College.Gayle,who is physically handicapped,was soon whizzing up and down the halls in the college. New swings were put in the park at {Paulton.}The tyre seats were soon slashed by vandals.
